house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1954 has 5 bedroom(s), 5 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car detached garage and approximately 8058 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room. Features include view, private pool, private spa, air conditioning, french doors.
house_listing.firm_name: Shelton & Assoc Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dishwasher, Fenced, Foyer, French Doors,Kitchen Island, Pantry, Trash Compacter, Wet Bar
